title: @kateykhaos What happened to that Irelia splash a year ago?
body:
The one leaked in that LCS match here:

http://i.imgur.com/4P3oPPq.png

I thought it looked really good, and would be an awesome update to her splash. Was it pulled due to issues with design conflicting with her in-game model, is a rework planned, etc? Any answer would be awesome <3

Sincerely,
VenturaThePoro, someone who is addicted to pretty Splashes.

PS: Remember not commenting to bump while upvoting causes a troll to afk everytime! ;)
